page.title: 09THE POCHARD DUCK
page.content: On the small lake there was a{pochard {duck.}It kept diving down for quite a long time at a time.He had a red head,white body,black breast and his tail was also black.He had grey legs and his wings were dark without any noticeable speculum. Each time it dived down I timed on my stopwatch how long it stayed submerged for.The average time for it staying submerged was{18.7seconds.}I timed it ten times,wrote down all the times,added them and divided the total by ten.This gave us the answer,18.7seconds,the average time for each dive.The longest dive was {23.4seconds}and the shortest was {13.9seconds.}It was followed on the surface by a swimming blackheaded gull. BY DARREN HOLLOWAY.
